question: Which state opens defecation-free village to be named after Donald Trump?
explanation: Sulabh International founder and chief Bindeshwar Pathak has announced that an open defecation-free (ODF) village in Mewat, Haryana will be named after the US President Donald Trump. The organisation is currently working in some villages of Mewat to make them ODF, one of which will be named after Trump.
